LanguageData.DMS_Army.label: Colonization Forces
LanguageData.DMS_Army.description:
A militarized colonial organization led by AI systems. Their culture is highly based on having a military class system. Through a mechanism where an indivifdual's strict repsonibility is enforced, anyone can find their place if they have proven their ability and competence to do so.
It can be determined that behind this colonial force is a huge organization capable of coordinating actions across galaxies even when interstellar voyages take decades.
